ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] money
ygData.msgSnippet: I make money baking.  I came up with an idea of a meal in a bag I buy a small 4 slot bag put a stack of patty melts and a stack of dessert and a stack of wine,
ygData.messageBody:
I make money baking. I came up with an idea of a meal in a bag I buy a
small 4 slot bag put a stack of patty melts and a stack of dessert and a
stack of wine, milk or water and top it off with a flower. It is quick and
easy and they sell like HOT cakes. Also as you get higher in baking you can
make things that have a proc value like justice fruit pies that raise your
states and halas meat pies.

Those that have 100kpp pay for it on site they buy their money I think that
is cheating and I won't waste that kind of money just to buy an over priced
weapon or pievce of armor

Rougejenna <therris-thule server>


>From: Su <suceress@...>
>Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: [EverQuest] money
>Date: Sun, 14 Dec 2003 06:17:53 -0600
>
>
> > hello everyone.. I am new to this club but not EQ.. Lets talk about
> > makeing money.. I know to kill giants and farm silks and hides to
> > make money and you make god money doing this.. But how the heck do
> > people make 100k and more lol.. most i have had at one time is 5k..
> > If there is a better way to make pp please let me know thanks
> >
>Basically farming and doing lost dungeon adventures is pretty profitable. I
>myself am not good at making money yet. I need to work on it. I'm hoping to
>be able to profit from my jewelcraft when I get it high enough. I had to
>get
>it high to work on my 7th shawl. If you have a foraging class, you can make
>coin foraging stuff to sell.
>Anyone know of good websites that have money making advice (not the pay
>sites)?
>luv,
>-Su
